org.doctag.connector

Class PdfConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.doctag.connector.Connector
      • org.doctag.connector.PdfConnector

  • public class PdfConnector
extends Connector
    A docTag connector which handles reading and writing docTag meta data in PDF documents using the Apache PDFBox library.
    Author:
    Jochen Schalanda

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.doctag.connector.Connector

      • PdfConnector

        public PdfConnector(InputStream inputStream)
             throws ConnectorException
        Create a new instance of PdfConnector.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The input stream containing the PDF data which will be processed
        Throws:

      • PdfConnector

        public PdfConnector(InputStream inputStream,
            Parser parser,
            Generator generator)
             throws ConnectorException
        Create a new instance of PdfConnector.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The input stream containing the PDF data which will be processed
        parser - The parser which is being used to parse the docTag meta data from the JSON format
        generator - The generator which is being used to generate the docTag meta data JSON format
        Throws:
        ConnectorException - If the input stream couldn't be read or doesn't contain a PDF document

        Read data from the input stream, parse it, and return a new docTag meta data document.

        Returns:
        The parsed docTag meta data
        Throws:
        DataNotFoundException - If the input stream doesn't contain any docTag meta data

      • write

        public void write(OutputStream outputStream,
         Document document)
           throws ConnectorException,
                  InvalidDataException
        Description copied from class: Connector
        Write the data read from the input stream back into an output stream while updating the docTag meta data inside.
        Overrides:
        write in class Connector
        Parameters:
        outputStream - The OutputStream in which the modified original data is being written
        document - The docTag meta data document which should be written into the originally read data
        Throws:
        ConnectorException - If an error occurred while writing to the output stream
        InvalidDataException - if the docTag meta data document contains invalid data
